page.title: 06SCHOOLGIRL IN TYDD ST.GILES
page.content: Dad comes and wakes me up.I get washed and dressed.I get my school lunch ready and then have my breakfast.For breakfast I have rice krispies,toast and a drink.Then I go and clean my teeth.Next I practice the piano for half an hour.I make my bed and clean my shoes and put them on.At 8.20a.m.I put my coat on and walk down the road to the corner.The bus usually comes at 8.36.We get on the bus and go and collect Daniel and Nathan,then Andrew and Sallyanne.We get to school and look at the duty list.Then we copy our week's spellings into our books.At about 9.10 we have spellings.I am in the same group as Maxine,Jill and Jonathan.In the morning we usually do some map work or maths.We have dinner at 12 noon. After dinner we have our playtime.
